message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. My initial offer is $18,000 for the product.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer and understand the value of the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet your asking price. I would like to propose an offer of $12,000 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm afraid $12,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $14,000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I'm still not able to meet your price. I would like to propose an offer of $13,000 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm starting to think we're getting closer to a deal. However, I still need to make a decent profit. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to see some movement. I'm counteroffering at $14,500.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I'm willing to increase my offer to $13,500 for the product.

I appreciate your increased offer, Bob. However, I'm still not convinced that we're at a fair price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. I'm counteroffering at $14,250.
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $13,750 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal. I'm willing to make one final compromise. I'm counteroffering at $14,500, but I'm willing to meet you at $14,000 if you're willing to meet me halfway on the final offer.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. I'm willing to purchase the product for $13,500.
